Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.extras

Note: none of the classes in this package are dependencies and can be safely removed or ignored, but may offer convenience utilities to one or more developers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Changelog.OnChangelogDismissedListener  
 

Class Summary
Changelog To use this class 4 resources are required:

R.raw.changelog: a changelog.txt file stored in the raw diretory of your application. R.string.changelog_title_full: the title to be used in a full screen change log. R.string.changelog_title: the title to be used in a non-full screen change log. R.string.changelog_ok: the text to display on the single button used to dismiss the change log.
Changelog.CustomWebView  
WPInflaterFactory WPInflaterFactory is a custom LayoutInflater.Factory for making XML inflation easier.
 

Package com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.extras Description

Note: none of the classes in this package are dependencies and can be safely removed or ignored, but may offer convenience utilities to one or more developers.

The developer of this library may be contacted at contact@tombarrasso.com.
